content:
The GBB selection of Leading Nordic Golf Clubs

It’s very important to Golf & Business Butler – Nordic Group, that our golf tournaments, matches and events are developed and executed at not only some of the very best Nordic Golfcourses, but also that the members of these particular, selected golfclubs fully enjoy and appreciate the extra time and effort we put into our luxurious golf concept. We are very excited to present these clubs for this years fullybooked GBB calendar and hopefully we will create enough smiles and good vibes to the golfers taking part, that we will be generously welcomed with more GBB matches in years to come.

clubs.name: Royal Golf Club
clubs.text1:
Royal Golf Club er en førsteklasses international mesterskabs golfbane, designet af den pensionerede Senior Chef designer hos Jack Nicklaus; Ron Kirby. Det færdige resultat blev præsenteret i 2010. Klubhuset med restaurant, fitness center, members lounge, players lounge, sauna, jacuzzi mm. blev indviet i 2011.

Allerede i 2012 lagde European Challenge Tour vejen forbi Royal Golf Club. Her blev en af de helt afgørende turneringer inden European Challenge Tour finalen spillet på Royal Championship Course. European Challenge Tour roste både afviklingen, faciliteterne og banen og udtrykte samtidigt et stort ønske om en dag at vende tilbage til Royal Golf Club med én af deres helt store turneringer.
clubs.text2: Royal Golf Club har en unik beliggenhed i et vidunderligt naturområde, en oase i København. Midt i hjertet af København med kun få minutter til Rådhuspladsen og Kongens Nytorv. Mere en 2.500 hotelværelser indenfor en radius på 2,5 kilometer. Royal Golf Club er en familieejet virksomhed og glæder sig meget til at byde alle Nordiske GBB klienter, deltagere og gæster velkommen til Royal Golf Club.

clubs.name: Kokkedal Golf Club
clubs.text1:
We bid all GBB Fans and GBB Golfers welcome to Kokkedal Golf Club, North Sealand

Kokkedal Golf Club was founded in 1971 as the 33rd golf club in Denmark. Kokkedal Golf Club has a 5 holes par-3 course, a driving range, 2 putting greens and a short game course. Our 18 holes course is a par 72 course, with a length of 63xx metres from tee 63, 59xx metres from tee 59, 55xx metres from tee 55 and 49xx metres from tee 49. For the gentlemen (tee 59) the course rating is 71,6 and slope 128. For the ladies (tee 49) the course rating is 72,0 and slope 122, The present course record from Tee 63 is 65 strokes (Niklas Nørgård Møller, KG) and from Tee 59 it is 64 strokes (Nigel Willett, our head Pro)

Our course is known as a very charming park course, on a lightly undulating, open country ground with varied vegetation and big old trees, and winding around famous Kokkedal Castle. From some holes you will be overlooking Oeresund, the narrow waters between Denmark and Sweden. The course may at first glance seem easy, but do not be mistaken, It is varied from hole to hole, each rich of challenges and requiring tactic and precision strokes. Fairways are fairly wide, and with several bunkers strategically well placed, and thus making our course guide a good helping hand, if you strive for an acceptable score.
clubs.text2:
Several holes have water hazards, which surely should be dealt with before hitting your ball. Our greens are fast, and some of which quite undulated, so putting requires reading of the green and determination. All in all a challenging course but fair for both high and low handicappers.

Between hole 9 and 10 you will find a halfway house with toilet and beverage vending machine

Further to our exciting course we offer a comfortable and lovely lounge-realaxed type club house with modern locker facilities for both ladies and gentlemen, and a well assorted pro shop, offering everything within golf equipment as Pro-training as well as rent of equipment, trollies and buggies

At Golf & Business Butler administration, we are honoured and very please to work with Kokkedal Golf Club, often hosting 3-5 matches a year at this gem of a North Sealand Golf Club.

Kokkedal GC welcome your visit, and hope you will have a pleasant and great golf experience.

clubs.name: Aalborg Golf Club
clubs.text1:
Aalborg Golf Club, situated in nothern Denmark, is one of Nordic Area’s hidden gems. Originally an 18 hole Championship Course designed by John D. Harris in the late 60s has resently undergone a complete refurbishment of all greens and tees along with 9 new holes, which are now integrated with the original 18 hole course to make 3 seperate 9-hole courses, which are rotated weekly to give one 18 hole course and one 9 hole course.

In other words, the 18 hole course changes combination every week. No matter wich of the course combinations that you play, you can always be assured that it will be a stern test of golf. Aalborgs geographical placement ensures that the elements are always in play at Aalborg. Some of the signature holes at Aalborg include the danish version of Amen Corner. These 3 holes were constructed in 2005 and are some of the most talked about holes in danish golf, along with the most picturesque par3 hole with the green area surrounded completely with rhododendrons, blooming in June.

The clubhouse has recently undergone extensive renovation including a first class Proshop along with typical Danish Cuisine in our renowned restaurant. Danish meatballs are a must on any visit to Aalborg while sitting in our picturesque restaurant which overlooks one of the finest finishing holes in Danish Golf. Our facilities also include a 26 bay driving range along with a short game area which is on par with the best facilities in Europe.
clubs.text2:
Various championships have been hosted by Aalborg Golf Club which include European Challenge Tour along with European Team Championship for Girls as well as European Championship for Men. Our mens team excel at the top of Danish Golf with 11 victories in the Danish Team Championships over the last 20 years. The height of these achievements is two European Team Championships back to back in 1998 and 1999.

We strive to achieve that every member/guest has the best possible experience at Aalborg Golf Club. We pride ourselves on achieving outstanding service and creating a memorable experience for all our guests. In November 2016, SNOWFLAKE BEER GOLF MATCH from the creative group of GOLF & BUSINESS BUTLER will come by for a day of famous Christmas Golf Tournament and hopefully treat 100 of our members with exclusive and luxurious prizes, goodiebags, entertainment and excitement We are also privileged that Denmarks third largest airport is situated 20 minuttes from the course with good connections to the UK from KLM, Norwegian and SAS. This facility makes it easy and troublefree to visit Aalborg on your next holiday.

Aalborg Golf Club looks forward to see you all

clubs.name: Odense Eventyr Golf Club
clubs.text1: Our GBB Writer is on his way

clubs.name: Simons Golf Club
clubs.text1:
Martin Hawtree is the world famous golfcourse designer of the 27 holes, 3 loop golf course at Simons GC in North Sealand, just 30kms from light-living capital of Denmark; Copenhagen and just 45mins away from Vasatorp in Sweden, near Helsingborg.

These 3 loops have been created entirely to international specifications with an excellent finish. The best possible drainage system has been installed, enabling play on the course all year, even after prolonged rain. The efficient drainage system also permits the use of normal greens and tees during the winter months. However, to maintain the high standards at Simon’s Golf Club it is necessary to close the course during snow and frost conditions to protect the health of the grass.

Golf & Business Butler with Tour Director Jan Pedersen has hosted several 100-golfers tournaments at Simons GC, including a couple of the much sought after and most popular Danish Christmas golf tournament; SNOWFLAKE BEER GOLF MATCH.
clubs.text2:
Also, Simons Golf Club hosted Denmarks first edition of an European Tour golf tournament - in 2003, at the NORDIC OPEN

The course is handicap and slope rated and has the following facilities:
  • * Four tees: white, yellow, red and blue
  • * Driving range with chipping green and bunkers
  • * 3 Putting Greens
  • * Par - 3 course: 6 holes with bunkers
  • * Indoor Training Centre


In 2016 Golf & Business Butler will welcome all Simon GCs Members of The Mens Section with luxurious GBB Match on August 3rd - Gunstart 15.00 (possibly more than 100 golfers will attend)

Welcome to Simons GC

clubs.name: Bokskogen Golf Club
clubs.text1:
Welcome to Bokskogens Golf Club for the allround luxurious golfing experience.

Your Swedish and Nordic golf experience would not be complete without a visit to Bokskogens Golf Club, one of the finest in Sweden, a trusted partner of Golf & Business Butler and chosen venue for The European Boys Team Championship 2006.

Venue for the 2003 Junior Solheim Cup, Bokskogen has hosted many amateur and professional tournaments including SEO and PLM Open on the European Tour which were the forerunners of what we know today as Scandinavian Masters. The Old Course has indeed proved a challenge for many well known European Tour and PGA Tour players.

Bokskogen, which has two testing courses, each offering a different environment, is only a twenty minute drive from Malmoe city centre and a good 30min drive from Nordic Areas busiest airport, the CPH Airport in Copenhagen, Denmark.
clubs.text2:
The Old Course with its generous fairways, water hazards and large immaculate putting surfaces, challenges club players and professionals alike. Some of the par fours offer a magnificent test of length and strategy while the Par 3 holes, especially the second, test both nerve and skill. The shorter New Course may not be as challenging as the Old Course, but offers a different test. The slighter narrower fairways and smaller greens put focus on the accuracy of the short game. The course offers beautiful scenery and wildlife.

Handicap certificate is necessary.

Contact Golf & Business Butler for availability and coordination on teetimes or go straight to Bokskogen website www.bokskogen.com

clubs.name: Stavanger Golf Club
clubs.text1:
Stavanger Golf Club was founded in 1956 and is one of Norway’s oldest clubs. The 18-hole course is situated 5 km from the town center, and lies in quiet surroundings near the lake «Store Stokkavann». The course, designed by British architect Fred Smith has a par of 71. It is a tree lined, and relatively tight layout.

Small greens and undulating fairways add to the challenge, and many championships have been held here, both national and international. Stavanger hosted the Norwegian Championships in August 2006.
clubs.text2:
The course has a very good driving range which is open to visitors, and also a nice putting green and other short play areas. Stavanger Proshop has 2 PGA certified professionals which are at your disposal every day. The club also has a newly refurbished gastropub restaurant Farmhouse with breathtaking views of the course.

We are very excited and happy to be part of the Golf & Business Butler Golf match series 2016 and we truly enjoy the elegant GBB services provided for our members all year long.

See you at Stavanger Golf Club

content:
The GBB selection of exciting luxurious International Golf Clubs

Endorsing and sending our Nordic VIP clients to unique and rare International Golf Clubs of the highest quality has over the past years grown ever more popular. Our Nordic Partner Clubs are very satisfied with this arrangement, as are the members of these particular Nordic Golf Clubs

We are happy and extremely proud to work with a small and carefully selected range of magical and luxuriously designed Golf Clubs in Europe -all of them only 3-4 hours flight away from Denmark, Sweden and Norway. These clubs value our butler standards here in Nordic region and they actually take these standards to higher levels upon arrival. Its safe to say, that our clients look forward to enjoy our GBB Packages on every occassion.
